item.description: This meetup with sample the gourmet pizzas made by Chef Peppe. The pizza consistently gets reviewed as some of the best in the state, maybe the country. Most of the ingredients are imported from Italy. There are some wonderful wines on the menu to complement the pizza. If we are lucky, Peppe will have some of his homemade Limoncello on hand!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the entrance of the restaurant
item.name: Gourmet Pizza by Chef Pepe from Naples
